category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clears Heat, resolves toxicity, invigorates the Blood and reduces swellings

indications: Sores and abscess, pruritic sores and rashes, erysipelas swollen and painful throat and cancer

action.primary: Promotes urination, and unblocks painful urinary dysfunction

indications: Hot, painful urinary dysfunction or edema with urinary dysfunction

contraindications: Do not use continuously due to accumulated toxicity.

useCases: Topically and internally for abscesses, sores and toxic swellings.

notes: This herb also expels Phlegm, stops cough and alleviates itching.

The leaves are used topically for pemphigus and other toxic swellings. They reduce Heat, disperse Blood, suppress toxic effects of minerals and metals. It also expels corrupted Blood in women and treats bronchitis along with a wide variety of cancers.
It has been shown to have an inhibitory effect on the growth of cancer cells.
The fruit restores the sinews and reduces deep-rooted swellings.
It is said to clear fever and treat Heat and swelling.
The root facilitates urination, especially with Caulis Akebiae #{MuTong} Mu Tong.
It is said to treat illnesses caused by Wind.
It treats Yuan Qi Deficiency in men and lochioschesis in women.
